text: You need a theme.json to make it a theme

Hello <@U04U0V56M1A>

See the document. Perfect help you.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes>
I've never done this before, but thinking you could use CSS to target the HubSpot generated form fields, and add an icon to the input fields using a pseudo-element ?

Reminder: Don’t forget to keep your HubSpot CLI up to date to ensure you have the latest CLI features, bug/usability fixes and performance improvements. • <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upgrade|How to upgrade your CLI to the latest version>.
